New Records: Mohammed Shami became the highest wicket-taker for India in ODI World Cups
Mohammed Shami equalled Mitchell Starc's tally for most five-wicket hauls in World Cups
Key Match Events: India defeated Sri Lanka by 302 runs
India's pacers destroyed the Sri Lankan chase inside the first two overs of their innings
Jasprit Bumrah struck with the first ball of the innings
Mohammed Siraj picked three wickets in his first two overs
Mohammed Shami picked his fourth wicket in just his third over
Pre-Game Insights: India were asked to bat by Kusal Mendis on a pitch which has already offered plenty of runs
Shubman Gill, Virat Kohli and Shreyas Iyer got India to an impregnable position
Post-Match Reflections: India have now reached the semifinals of ODI World Cups for the fourth successive time
India have been just as clinical in 2023, defeating Australia, Afghanistan, Pakistan, Bangladesh, New Zealand and England before travelling to Mumbai to take on Sri Lanka
Miscellaneous Highlights: India have now reached the semifinals of ODI World Cups for the fourth successive time
India's 302-run victory is now their biggest win in one-day internationals
India are the only undefeated team in the tournament so far and are currently on top of the points table with 14 points from 7 matches
